Html:
Hi Jbarciauskas,

I'm not sure if you read this but I hope you do; you submitted a patch to remove the x86 targeting but haven't updated any of the other source code to support a 64 bit platform. This would actually cause NAudio to fail on the 64 bit platform rather than making it a compatible 64 bit dll. This addition has been added specifically so that NAudio can be used on a 64 bit version of windows through the WOW compatibility layer.

Cheers,
Sebastian
